original_text: And you shall set the table outside the veil, and the lampstand on the south side of the tabernacle opposite the table, and you shall put the table on the north side.
korean_text: 그 휘장 바깥 북쪽에 상을 놓고 남쪽에 등잔대를 놓아 상과 마주하게 할지며

sentences.original_text: And you shall set the table outside the veil
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 휘장 바깥에 상을 두어야 하고

sentences.original_text: and the lampstand on the south side of the tabernacle
and you shall put the table on the north side
